titles.title: Holy God We Praise Thy Name

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Holy God, we praise Thy name; newline Lord of all, we bow before Thee. newline All on earth, Thy scepter claim, newline All in heaven above adore Thee. newline Infinite Thy vast domain, newline Everlasting is Thy reign.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Hark the glad celestial hymn; newline Angel choirs above are raising. newline Cherubim and seraphim, newline In unceasing chorus praising; newline Fill the heavens with sweet accord, newline Holy, holy, holy Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: All apostles join the strain, newline As Thy sacred name they hallow. newline Prophets swell the glad refrain newline And the blessed martyrs follow newline And from morn to set of sun, newline Through the church the song goes on.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Holy Father, holy Son, newline Holy Spirit, three we name Thee. newline Though in essence only one, newline Undivided God we claim Thee; newline And adoring bend the knee, newline While we sing our praise to Thee.
